content: in this legal case a court in messina issued a ruling between two parties the court ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiffs costs of the proceedings while the plaintiff was ordered to pay the defendants costs the court approved a divisional project prepared by a courtappointed expert which assigned certain land to the plaintiffs and the remaining property to the defendant the plaintiffs were also ordered to pay the defendant a balance amount the case involved disputes over jointlyowned property and alleged damages caused by one of the parties the court dismissed the claims of both parties and specified the costs to be paid by each party the decision was made on january 20 2017 in messina
